author: cmlenz
msg: Tomcat 4.1 has had releases by now; Require a class only available in Tomcat 4.1

author: cmlenz
msg: The problem is that java.lang.Throwable has a getCause(): Throwable
method since JDK1.4, which conflicts with a getCause(): Exception, of
course. This change should fix that, while not introducing any problems

author: cmlenz
msg: Use the JDOM JAR in our lib-directory by default

author: juergen
msg: Removed escaping of '<' and '>' in the messges of the exceptions thrown in parseRequest().

author: juergen
msg: print the stacktrace in case of jdk exceptions only (not in the case of a SlideException).
